hero.title: Construction is the art of creating the future with materials.
hero.description: We are TD Capital Market company - specializing in construction of residential and non-residential buildings, reconstruction of infrastructure destroyed by war, construction of shelters and underground complexes. Our projects combine modern technologies, quality materials and a responsible approach.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: Construction of residential and non-residential buildings, reconstruction of infrastructure destroyed by war, construction of shelters and underground facilities. Use of modern technologies and materials to ensure safety and durability.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Production of fortification structures: metal structures and concrete barrier pyramids. All products comply with DSTU B V.2.6-2:2009 standards.

design.title: Design
design.description: Development of building and structure concepts taking into account safety requirements and state standards. Complete design cycle - from idea to implementation.

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: Comprehensive provision, participation in public procurement, execution of contracts with public and private customers. Fast delivery and logistics optimization to minimize costs and time.

hero.title: TD Capital Market
hero.mainQuote: We don't just build structures — we create a reliable future
hero.paragraph1: «TD Capital Market» is a team of professionals specializing in the construction of residential and non-residential facilities, infrastructure reconstruction, construction of shelters and underground complexes. Since 2016, we have successfully implemented projects of any complexity, using modern technologies, quality materials and innovative approaches.

mainContentSection.title: About our company
mainContentSection.paragraph1: «TD Capital Market» is a team of professionals specializing in the construction of residential and non-residential facilities, infrastructure reconstruction, construction of shelters and underground complexes. Since 2016, we have successfully implemented projects of any complexity, using modern technologies, quality materials and innovative approaches.
mainContentSection.paragraph2: One of our key areas is the production of metal structures and concrete solutions that ensure safety and durability. We work responsibly and adhere to international standards, which is confirmed by our certified management system: ISO 9001(2015), ISO 45001(2019), 14001(2015).

process.descriptionOne: Detailed study of client needs, concept development and cost estimation of work.
process.descriptionTwo: Creation of technical documentation, 3D modeling of objects and coordination of all details.
process.descriptionThree: Manufacturing of metal structures, material preparation and construction of the facility under engineer supervision.
process.descriptionFour: Strict control of each stage of work and delivery of the facility with complete documentation and warranty.

featuredProject.title: Our landmark project
featuredProject.description: Complex of protective structures and shelters, implemented in 2023 for the defense sector. The project included reconstruction of a historic building on Soborna Street, 151. Restoration of the facade and interior spaces while preserving the historical value of the building.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We keep our promises and guarantee quality

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly improve processes and technologies

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We work taking into account the interests of clients, society and the environment

cta.title: Ready to implement your project?
cta.text: Trust us to implement your construction ideas. Our team will ensure quality work execution while adhering to all standards and deadlines.

faq.title: Questions and Answers
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most popular questions about our services
faq.ctaTitle: Can't find the answer to your question?
faq.ctaText: Our specialists are ready to help you with any questions you may have.

latestProjects.title: Our Latest Projects
latestProjects.subtitle: Explore our most recent construction and reconstruction work

design.title: Our design projects
design.description: We create functional and aesthetic design solutions for various types of objects. Our design team works to create modern spaces that meet the needs of our clients.
